title: Portfolio
text:
Project Gallery

Multi-UAV Connected Coverage Search
Project Description: Deployed distributed multi-UAVs for cooperative search in an information map, aligning UAV trajectories with information distribution to acquire more information. Implemented frequency domain-based coverage search algorithm and ensured multi-UAV connectivity through probability-based path planning.
Technologies Used: - ROS (Robot Operating System) - iLQR Trajectory Optimization - Python/C++ - Gazebo Simulation

title: Yucheng Chen
text:
Project Experience

Multi-UAV Connected Coverage Search
Project Leader｜2025.09 – Present
- Deployed distributed multi-UAVs for cooperative search in an information map, aligning UAV trajectories with information distribution to acquire more information.
- Key Contributions：
1. Coverage Search: Implemented frequency domain-based UAV coverage search algorithm to improve coverage efficiency in information-dense areas.
2. Multi-UAV Connectivity: Introduced connectivity probability as a cost term into the path planner to ensure multi-UAV communication and cooperation.
3. Used iLQR for trajectory optimization.


Wind-Disturbed UAV Target Search and Delivery
Project Leader｜2024.07 – 2024.10
- Outdoor environment: Load-carrying UAV autonomously flew and searched for target white barrels in an 8×5m area, delivered payloads, and returned to base for landing.
- Key Contributions：
1. Fuzzy PID Controller (C++): Implemented fuzzy rules to adaptively adjust PID coefficients for precise control under wind disturbances.
2. Path Planning Algorithm VFH: Solved current feasible points and generated smooth paths through B-spline curve optimization.
3. Filter Algorithm Deployment: Combined Kalman filter and low-pass filter to remove noise and smooth controller output.


Obstacle Forest Express Delivery UAV
Project Leader｜2023.10 – 2024.05
- Indoor environment: Load-carrying UAV (3×100g express boxes) performed tasks in a 10×10m area: searched for 5 targets, delivered packages, and avoided dense obstacles.
- Key Contributions：
1. ROS-based Flight Code (C++): Implemented obstacle avoidance and delivery tasks in obstacle forest and narrow corridor environments.
2. Localization and Path Generation: Deployed FAST-LIO and Ego-Planner for high-precision localization and obstacle avoidance path planning.
3. MPC Controller (C++): Computed control inputs online based on target points and constraints to achieve high-precision tracking of global paths.


3rd University Intelligent Robot Creativity Competition - UAV Group A Competition
Participant｜2024.08 – 2024.11
- Participated in the UAV Group A Competition, focusing on autonomous flight tasks with obstacle avoidance and target recognition.
- Key Contributions：
1. Autonomous Flight Control: Developed robust flight control algorithms for UAVs in dynamic environments.
2. Obstacle Avoidance System: Implemented real-time obstacle detection and avoidance using sensor fusion.
3. Target Recognition: Integrated computer vision systems for target detection and identification.

title: 中文简历
text:
项目经历

多无人机联通遍历搜索
项目负责人｜2025.09 – 至今
- 部署分布式多无人机在一个信息地图中进行协同搜索，使无人轨迹分布对齐地图的信息分布，以获取更多信息。
- 主要工作：
1. 遍历搜索：部署基于频域分析的无人机遍历搜索算法，提升对信息密集区域的覆盖效率。
2. 多无人机连通：将无人机间的连通概率作为代价项引入路径规划器，保障多机通信与协同。
3. 使用 iLQR 进行轨迹优化。


风扰动下无人机目标搜索+投放
项目负责人｜2024.07 – 2024.10
- 室外环境下，载重无人机自主飞行并在 8×5m 区域内寻找目标白桶投放载重物，完成后自主返航降落。
- 主要工作：
1. 模糊 PID 控制器（C++）：通过模糊规则自适应调整 PID 系数，实现风扰动下的精准控制。
2. 路径规划算法 VFH：求解当前可行点，并通过 B 样条曲线优化生成光滑路径。
3. 滤波算法部署：结合卡尔曼滤波与低通滤波器，滤除噪声，使控制器输出平滑。


障碍物森林中的快递无人机
项目负责人｜2023.10 – 2024.05
- 室内环境下，载重（3×100g 快递盒）无人机在 10×10m 区域执行任务：寻找 5 个目标并投放，同时躲避密集障碍物。
- 主要工作：
1. 基于 ROS 的飞行代码（C++）：实现障碍森林、狭窄走廊环境下的避障与投放任务。
2. 定位与路径生成：部署 FAST-LIO 与 Ego-Planner 实现高精度定位与避障路径规划。
3. MPC 控制器（C++）：根据目标点与约束条件在线计算控制量，实现对全局路径的高精度跟踪。

title: 作品展示
text:
项目 gallery

多无人机联通遍历搜索
项目描述： 部署分布式多无人机在一个信息地图中进行协同搜索，使无人轨迹分布对齐地图的信息分布，以获取更多信息。实现了基于频域分析的覆盖搜索算法，并通过基于概率的路径规划确保多机连通性。
使用技术： - ROS（机器人操作系统） - iLQR 轨迹优化 - Python/C++ - Gazebo 仿真

我的 个人主页 是基于 Chi Zhang (github) 的个人主页修改而来的。
你可以 Fork 本仓库，然后酌情修改你的个人信息，编译后即可生成你的个人主页。这种方法无需注册域名，也不用学习 HTML 和 CSS 等前端知识，直接使用 GitHub Pages 即可完成个人主页的搭建。
具体制作过程参见：

连小白, 2025, 50 分钟搞定个人主页：Fork 模板 + GitHub Pages + Quarto 完整教程.

本仓库的使用方法：

你可以点击本页右上方的 ⭐Star 按钮来收藏本仓库，方便日后查阅；
也可以点击 Use this template 按钮来快速 Fork 本仓库。
你制作个人主页期间有任何问题，可以在 Discussions 提问和讨论。
